name: Aero Club Biella
about: Aeroclub Biella is a small but comprehensive flying school based at Biella-Cerrione Airport in Italy. With the certification IT.ATO.0018, we offer a full range of training programs from zero hours to ATPL (Airline Transport Pilot Licence). Our facility operates from Tuesday to Sunday, with flight school rooms available from 08:30 to 23:00 and the secretariat open from 09:00 to 19:00. We pride ourselves on professionalism, competence, and a relaxed, family-like atmosphere. Our experienced instructors provide personalized training to ensure each student's success, whether pursuing flying as a hobby or a career. At Aeroclub Biella, we are dedicated to providing high-quality flight training in a supportive and safe environment.
services:
["LIGHT AIRCRAFT PILOT LICENSE LAPL-A
